channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prudential Plans $2 Billion Share Buyback
item.description: The U.K. insurer’s business has seen robust growth since the lifting of pandemic restrictions in China and Hong Kong.

item.title: An overbought market is a worry for traders but great for investors, according to Jefferies
item.description: Critical information for the U.S. trading day

item.title: Hedge Funds Made a Killing on FTX---Then It Got Complicated
item.description: Investors allege former FTX customers abruptly reneged on selling claims to their accounts and are suffering from an age-old affliction: seller’s remo...

item.title: ‘My mother is being catfished’: She fell ‘madly in love’ with a man over Facebook. How do I convince her that it’s a scam?
item.description: “My sister and I found loads of evidence online that this is a fake account. There are actually numerous fake accounts on various platforms that use t...

item.title: Holiday Travel Is Booming. Why Are Airlines Doing So Badly?
item.description: It is shaping up to be the busiest summer season ever in the U.S., and about as strong as 2019’s in Europe. Yet both low-cost and full-service carrier...

item.title: Treasury yields steady as traders eye PCE inflation data later in week
item.description: Bond yields were little changed early Monday as traders awaited fresh guidance on the likely trajectory of Federal Reserve policy.

item.title: Asian Buyout Firm Shortlists Bidders for $800 Million Malaysia Hospital Sale
item.description: Malaysia’s IHH Healthcare and Sunway are among the three bidders in a race to acquire one of the country’s largest hospitals from buyout firm Affinity...

item.title: Apple’s App Store rules breach EU competition law, European Commission says
item.description: Apple could be facing a fresh fine after the European Commission said the rules it uses to govern its AppStore are in breach of the Digital Markets Ac...

item.title: These Hot New Funds Are 'Boomer Candy' for Retirees
item.description: Derivative strategies in ETFs allow investors to chase stock returns while also offering protection against a potential market downturn.

item.title: Take a look at Meghan Trainor’s completely renovated $12 million mansion in Encino, Calif.
item.description: Trainor and her husband stand to make a tidy profit on the posh property, which they bought in 2020.
